mapper.select: SELECT * FROM eco_risk WHERE delete_flag = '0' AND enterprise_id = #{value} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into eco_risk ( `safe_trouble_id`, `enterprise_id`, `equipment_id`, `people_find_name`, `find_time`, `level`, `type`, `apart`, `remark`, `rectificat`, `rect_user_name`, `surveyted_person_name`, `surveyted_person_position`, `full_form_time`, `survey_person_name`, `create_time`, `create_user_name`, `create_by`, `modify_time`, `modify_user_name`, `modify_by`, `delete_flag`, `administrative_division`, `urbanorrural` ) values ( #{safeTroubleId}, #{enterpriseId}, #{equipmentId}, #{peopleFindName}, #{findTime}, #{level}, #{type}, #{apart}, #{remark}, #{rectificat}, #{rectUserName}, #{surveytedPersonName}, #{surveytedPersonPosition}, #{fullFormTime}, #{surveyPersonName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{createUserName}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{modifyUserName}, #{modifyBy}, '0', #{administrativeDivision}, #{urbanorrural} )
mapper.update: update eco_risk set delete_flag = '1', modify_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where safe_trouble_id = #{value}

update eco_risk set `modify_time` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), `delete_flag` = '1' where safe_trouble_id in
#{safeTroubleId}
